mapper.insert: INSERT INTO posts (text, title, category, created_at, deleted_at, user_id) VALUES (#{content}, #{title}, #{category}, #{createdAt}, NULL, #{userId});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM posts p WHERE p.id = #{id} AND p.deleted_at IS NOT NULL;

SELECT id as id, title as title, category as category, created_at as createdAt, user_id as userId FROM posts p WHERE p.category = #{category} AND p.deleted_at IS NOT NULL ORDER BY p.category DESC LIMIT 10 OFFSET #{page}
